value:
$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|This way, Brother! Come on!$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|I heard you, all right? Don't rush me.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|I've been waiting all day to show you
this beach. The sand practically
sparkles in the sunset. It's glorious!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Ahem. Did someone say "glorious"?$k$pRather rude of you to give the sun all
the glory, no? Surely my radiance is
a contributing factor.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|Oh, L'Arachel! Apologies, I...didn't
mean to forget you.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Ha! As if you could, my friend!$k$pNow, would you be so kind as to
lead the way? I want to see this
sparkling sand myself.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|Of course. Right this way—oh, wait!
We should stop at that stand over
there first!$k$pTrust me, these frozen treats are
absolutely incredible.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|Frozen treats? All right, you have
my attention.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|They come in all sorts of flavors! Do
any of these catch your eye, Brother?
Personally, I like the fruity ones best.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|Hang on. You had this little stop in
mind all along, didn't you?$k$pThis was just a ploy to get me to buy
you sweets.$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|What?! Of course not! Your loving
sister would never devise such a
devious and cunning scheme!$k$p$WmMPID_水着エフラム,ch08_00_Ephraim_M_Swim23,Face|Twist my arm, why don't you? Fine,
go ahead. You too, L'Arachel—pick
one out for your...self?$k$p$WmMPID_水着エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Swim22,Face|L'Arachel? Where did you go?$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|Those twins certainly do get along
just swimmingly.$k$pEager as they may be for the pleasure
of my company, I think it is best to
leave them their brother-sister time.$k$pThose frozen treats did sound lovely,
but...ah, well. Another time.$k$pNow then—it hardly befits one of my
station to be alone and bored on the
beach. Let's see who we can find.$k$p$WmMPID_水着シェズ女,ch17_68_Sheds_F_Swim23,Face|How about a swimming race? It'd be
perfect training for battle at sea.$k$p$WmMPID_水着シェズ男,ch17_67_Sheds_M_Swim23,Face|Sure. Count me in!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|What do we have here? Is that yet
another pair of twins?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_水着シェズ女,ch17_68_Sheds_F_Swim23,Face|Phew! Hah... Ha! Victory!$k$p$WmMPID_水着シェズ男,ch17_67_Sheds_M_Swim23,Face|Seriously?! Ugh, rematch!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Swim23,Face|They seem to have a lively dynamic
as well. It must be something truly
special, to have a sibling.$k$pNot that I'm jealous...$k$p$Sbs150|
